data.name: Ray & Stoic Gronk
data.detailed_description:
Two Heads Are Better Than One... Right?




Ray, a razor-sharp blade with an attitude to match. Under mysterious circumstances, he finds himself transformed into a sword and thrust into unknown territory. Ray’s only goal - is to get back home and regain his humanity.

Gronk is the last of an ancient race of warriors known as the Dokken. Culled to fulfill a pact by the Elders of the High Council, Gronk must reclaim the Capital and prevent Malice, a powerful warlock and leader of the savage Ragnar from releasing an ancient evil intent on destruction.

Join Ray and Gronk on a prolific quest through the continent of Marathon, as they work together to unite the Elders and prevent Malice from reincarnating an ancient evil that knows no bounds.

Features


  • Savage sword-swinging skirmishes

  • Unlock new abilities to traverse the world and conquer your foes



  • Trample and pulverize foes in a giant mech

  • Test your might against a legion of epic bosses



  • Upgrade your skills from defeated foes to become a true Dokken warrior.

  • Engage in a captivating tale with unique locales, odd characters, and uncomfortable situations.


“Oh and I would really like to get home and not be a sword anymore - I miss having lungs!”
- Ray

data.short_description: A techno-fantasy adventure brimming with eclectic characters, pulse-pounding platforming, and brutal combat. Discover secrets, solve puzzles, and conquer intimidating foes - each more deadly than the last.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.11.x
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
